title: France panorama. [No. 65?/38]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Le Paquebot des sables - Shows a dredge in South France preparing for the beaching of the liner ‘Lydia’. 2. Le Monde de Miro - shows paintings on cardboard by artist Joan Miro. 3. Sports nautiques - coverage of French water-skiers. 4. Vu pour voux - a look at Americans in Gourin in Britanny, north-west France. 5. Two views of Paris in August - 6.00am and 9.00am and special luxury cattery in Parisian suburb.
